mean_cn: n. 开关，转换；  v. 改变，交换，转换，鞭打
mean_en: a small device that starts or stops the flow of electricity to something (such as a lamp or a machine) when it is pressed or moved up and down
sentence: There are so many switches in your home! Which one turns on the lights?
sentence_trans: 你家有这么多开关，哪一个能把灯打开？
